thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: No complaints - Review
thread.title_full: No complaints - Review of Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: seachelle3523
title: No complaints - Review
text:
Great hotel in a great location , close to London Bridge station with links straight to Gatwick . Ten min walk to great pubs , restaurants etc on the river front, 5 mins from the Shard -
Re hotel amenities- it has everything you'll need - tho iron in room would be good. Didn't eat in hotel so can't comment on food but staff very nice and approachable
